   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Base Package's documentation!
========================================

Base Package is a bundle of Python packages which may be useful in many applications.
Currently there is some code for logging and random testing.


Contents:

   :maxdepth: 2

   release-notes
   tutorial
   api
